# Special Protocol Links

These should be skipped:

- [Email](mailto:test@example.com)
- [Phone](tel:+1234567890)
- [JavaScript](javascript:void(0))

## Empty and Edge Cases

- [Empty href]()
- [Hash only](#)
- [Query params](./other.mdx?foo=bar)
- [With trailing slash](./other/)
